descriptionHtml:
Hello , this is my first followers mod it only adds 2 followers in the Sleeping giant inn (at riverwood)
if you want me to make non-essenstials just ask :)


Ryan and stella are two new followers there is nothing special about them but they are strong and can take hits (they are also essenstial) you can find them in riverwood's Sleeping giant inn
<br />
<br />To install : copie stella&ryanfollowers.esm to your data folder
author: Amer
